document_notes.text:
This update for ImageMagick fixes the following issues:

- security update:
  * CVE-2016-6520: buffer overflow [bsc#991872]
  * CVE-2016-6491: Out-of-bounds read in CopyMagickMemory [bsc#991445]
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Buffer overflow in the Get8BIMProperty function in MagickCore/property.c in ImageMagick before 6.9.5-4 and 7.x before 7.0.2-6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read, memory leak, and crash) via a crafted image.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

notes.text: Buffer overflow in MagickCore/enhance.c in ImageMagick before 7.0.2-7 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors related to pixel cache morphology.
